EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal Partner Days_2017.Denver SI Replat Track
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Partner Days - Denver - Apr. 13th, 2017 | Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Partner Days in Denver, CO!
We look forward to hosting you at our partner event. Your event confirmation details can be found below:
What: Pivotal Partner Days System Integrator Workshop: Replatforming Track When: Thursday, April 13, 2017 Where: Galvanize - Platte, 1644 Platte Street, Denver, CO 80202
The event will begin promptly at 11:00am. Please arrive 15 minutes early to sign in.
Remember to bring your laptops!
If you have any questions please contact Cameron Stewart (cstewart@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cstewart@pivotal.io]]>) or Andrew Mackenzie (amackenzie@pivotal.io <[[mailto:amackenzie@pivotal.io]]>).
Thanks and we look forward to seeing you in Denver!
- Pivotal Partner Alliances Team
